item.title: Using PGP and Cryptocurrency Keysignatures
item.description: "Prove you are who you say you are, with public key encryption: supporting secure crypto-currency transactions with strangers online since 1991!!" I created this resource while researching the following article: freelanceforcoins.com/Business with Crypto 101—Escrow and Key Signatures -infominer >This article will explain what is escrow, how to find an escrow agent, and using key signatures to verify who you are communicating with — including the use of Bitcoin and Ethereum signatures to prove (and verify) ownership of a particular address.
